title: Who has lived the most unbelievable life in human history? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a western region of Asia, a dark-skinned fellow gave up wood-working to try being a preacher for a couple years. He had been born in an obscure village, the child of a peasant woman. He never wrote a book. He never held an office. He never had a family or owned a home. He never got much of a formal education. A lot of people didn’t like his sermons and when public opinion turned against him, his friends ran away. One actually turned him in to the authorities. After being tortured, he was brutally killed. 	While He was dying, His executioners gambled for His garments, the only property He had on earth. Twenty centuries have come and gone, and today he is the central figure of the human race. All the armies that ever marched, all the navies that ever sailed, all the parliaments that ever sat, all the kings that ever reigned, put together, have not affected the life of man on this earth as much as that one solitary life. In fact, the whole world counts time (B.C. - A.D.) based on his birth. Even the most vitriolic atheist when writing 2019 acknowledges that. Napoleon remarked, “I search in vain in history to find the similar to Jesus Christ, or anything which can approach the gospel…nations pass away, thrones crumble, but the Church remains.” Today there are 1.8 billion followers of Christ. Grab a Bible and read about the amazing things He did if you really want to learn about one unbelievable life.

Who has lived the most unbelievable life in human history? There are so many that I’ll name only my favorites. My list from memory Walt Disney, the immeasurable joy he brought to the World.Steven Spielberg, one of the greatest story tellers in the history of cinema.Barack Obama, an Historic US President who made the US & the World a better place to live in.Steve Irwin, the Crocodile Hunter a man who loves animals more than anyone I can think just like # 5 below.Jane Morris Goodall, ditto my sentiments from # 4 above. If only other people in the World could be a 10th as giving as she was/is, the World would be way a better place to live.Bill Gates, a humanitarian of astronomical proportions and creator of a company that gave the World the most useful software all with no College degree.Steve Jobs, a master visionary who gave us with the aid of his hand picked employees, so many wonderful inventions all with no College degree.Albert Einstein. The World is better for his life achievements.Steven Hawking. He outlived his disease and the World is better for his life achievements.etcetera …………..
